name: Sky Invader
description: A variant clone based from our childhood arcade game called Space Invader, you will be played as a land cannon protecting the earth surface from being invaded by aliens. Your goal is to prevent enemies from reaching the ground level by destroying them with cannon bullets as well as protecting civilians nearby and staying alive with an impenetrable barrier which can blocks bullet from both side include your cannon bullet, therefore if the shield if up you can’t really shoot either but will be completely safe underneath. First goal is to destroy all enemies, second goal is to gain as much score as possible. Having civilians killed won’t lose the game but means losing a lot of points in total.
